700875f-a.text:
552 E. Fordham Road, at the S.E. corner of Lorillard Place. Behind the 1-story drug store building and the White Castle eating place is an old frame house. On the rigt is part of Public School
No. 45 on Lorillard Place.
May 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
700875f-a.folder: Fordham Road (East) & Lorillard Place, Bronx, NY
